description:
Chastity has been an obedient and thoughtful little whore, but today she will be confronted with the double sided reward and punishment of sexual service. No less, she must serve two of the most demanding doms in the business: Aiden Star and Derrick Pierce. Her trainers become irate waiting for her arrival on set and come up to surprise her in her quarters. Her placid submission is broken as she is thrown into intense exercise torture and struggles for breath under Aidens ass.
Once her calm demeanor is shattered, she is dragged downstairs, immobilized in tight bondage, and made to suck, fuck, endure great pain and many orgasms before Aiden and Derrick will give her a pass for the day. Good job chastity.
title: Chastity Shattered: Day Three
